title: rclone Cannot Update Hidden Files On Windows
body:
If I have "Folder 1" and "Folder 2", and there is a hidden file in each of the folders rclone will throw the error

> ERROR : A.txt: Failed to copy: Access is denied.

To recreate this:

1. Make "Folder 1" and "Folder 2".
2. Create a text file "A.txt" in both folders. 
3. Mark both copies of "A.txt" as hidden. (Right click > Properties > hidden. Or "attrib +h")
4. Fill the two copies of A.txt with different words and sentences. 
5. `>` rclone sync "Folder 1" "Folder 2"

>`>`rclone sync "Folder 1" "Folder 2"
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : A.txt: Failed to copy: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Attempt 1/3 failed with 3 errors and: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : A.txt: Failed to copy: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Attempt 2/3 failed with 3 errors and: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : A.txt: Failed to copy: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting files as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Local file system at //?/C:/Users/Edison/Desktop/Folder 2: not deleting directories as there were IO errors
2020/01/01 00:05:57 ERROR : Attempt 3/3 failed with 3 errors and: Access is denied.
2020/01/01 00:05:57 Failed to sync with 3 errors: last error was: Access is denied.


This is a really common error in Windows file syncing apps, I'm surprised no one has caught this bug yet!

Happy New Years!
